title: An Experiment in towns
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Cities and towns - Growth

description: Shows the reasons why Britain has recently built fifteen towns - to give healthier working conditions, closer proximity to work, and enable "men to lunch in their own homes". Explains how the planned towns are designed to allow safe play for children and creative leisure for adults. Shows the good design of individual homes.
